omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
    apc.NHSNumber, 
    apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, 
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
    coalesce(max(apc.DeliveryDate), max(apc.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
    apc.AnaestheticGivenPostDelivery
from omop_staging.sus_APC as apc
where apc.AnaestheticGivenPostDelivery is not null
  and apc.NHSNumber is not null
  and apc.CdsType in ('140', '120')
group by 
    apc.NHSNumber, 
    apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
    apc.DeliveryDate,
    apc.AnaestheticGivenPostDelivery;

omopColumns.name: value_as_string

dataSource.name: AnaestheticGivenPostLabourDelivery
dataSource.description: Records whether anaesthetic was given after Delivery, and the type used.

origins.origin: ANAESTHETIC GIVEN POST LABOUR OR DELIVERY CODE
